error.message: Class Drupal\number_abbreviation\Twig\TwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFilter: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFilter" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
